                <script>
                    function openCity(evt, cityName) {
                        var i, pqr, tablinks;
                        tabcontent = document.getElementsByClassName("pqr");
                        for (i = 0; i < tabcontent.length; i++) {
                            tabcontent[i].style.display = "none";
                        }
                        tablinks = document.getElementsByClassName("tablinks");
                        for (i = 0; i < tablinks.length; i++) {
                            tablinks[i].className = tablinks[i].className.replace(" active", "");
                        }
                        document.getElementById(cityName).style.display = "block";
                        evt.currentTarget.className += " active";
                    }
                </script>

    <script>
        /* Loop through all dropdown buttons to toggle between hiding and showing its dropdown content - This allows the user to have multiple dropdowns without any conflict */
        var dropdown = document.getElementsByClassName("dropdown");
        var i;

        for (i = 0; i < dropdown.length; i++) {
            dropdown[i].addEventListener("click", function () {
                this.classList.toggle("active");
                var dropdownContent = this.nextElementSibling;
                if (dropdownContent.style.display === "block") {
                    dropdownContent.style.display = "none";
                } else {
                    dropdownContent.style.display = "block";
                }
            });
        }
    </script>

        <script>
            /* Loop through all dropdown buttons to toggle between hiding and showing its dropdown content - This allows the user to have multiple dropdowns without any conflict */
            var dropdown = document.getElementsByClassName("dropdown1");
            var i;

            for (i = 0; i < dropdown.length; i++) {
                dropdown[i].addEventListener("click", function () {
                    this.classList.toggle("active");
                    var dropdownContent = this.nextElementSibling;
                    if (dropdownContent.style.display === "block") {
                        dropdownContent.style.display = "none";
                    } else {
                        dropdownContent.style.display = "block";
                    }
                });
            }

var link = document.getElementById("example-link");
var box = document.getElementById("example-box");
var click = document.getElementById("click");
var click2 = document.getElementById("click2");
const link2 = document.getElementById("link2");
const box2 = document.getElementById("box2");
var isBoxVisible = false;

link.addEventListener("click", function(event) {
  event.preventDefault();
  if (isBoxVisible) {
    box.style.display = "none";
    isBoxVisible = false;
  } else {
    box.style.display = "block";
    click.style.display = "none"
    isBoxVisible = true;
  }
});
link2.addEventListener("click", function(event) {
  event.preventDefault();
  if (isBoxVisible) {
    box2.style.display = "none";
    isBoxVisible = false;
  } else {
    box2.style.display = "block";
    click2.style.display = "none"
    isBoxVisible = true;
  }
});

link.addEventListener("mouseover", function() {
  if (!isBoxVisible) {
    box.style.display = "block";
  }
  if (!isBoxVisible) {
    click.style.display = "block";
  }
});
link2.addEventListener("mouseover", function() {
  if (!isBoxVisible) {
    box2.style.display = "block";
  }
  if (!isBoxVisible) {
    click2.style.display = "block";
  }
});

link.addEventListener("mouseout", function() {
  if (!isBoxVisible) {
    box.style.display = "none";
    click.style.display = "none";
  }
});

link2.addEventListener("mouseout", function() {
  if (!isBoxVisible) {
    box2.style.display = "none";
    click2.style.display = "none";
  }
});




var hoverCount = 0;

$('.disappearing-div').hover(function() {
    hoverCount++;
    if (hoverCount == 2) {
        $(this).hide();
    }
}, function() {
    $(this).css('display', 'none');
});
